785080.name: Treasure Adventure World - Official Soundtrack & Instruction Booklet
785080.description:
Over an hour of adventure fueled music for your ears!
The original soundtrack for Treasure Adventure World includes 39 tracks in both MP3 and FLAC formats.

Music by Robert Ellis & Craig Barnes
Cover by Christine Crossley

Also includes a digital Instruction Booklet modeled after the classic NES booklets with 25 pages of original art by Christine Crossley
